TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SpecialSetting extends System.Enum

remarks.para: The enumeration defines a set of special categories that are applied to application settings properties with the class.

block.para: The default settings provider, , does not encrypt or otherwise protect connection strings. It simple stores this type of settings in a separate <connectionstrings> section in the appropriate configuration file.

summary.para: Specifies the special setting category of a application settings property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.SpecialSetting ConnectionString = int32(0)

summary.para: The configuration property represents a connection string, typically for a data store or network resource.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.SpecialSetting WebServiceUrl = int32(1)

summary.para: The configuration property represents a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) to a Web service.
